about_the_game:
Gods of Fire is a multiplayer online PvP game where you command powerful dragons in fierce battles for dominance.

Welcome to a realm where fantasy and action collide. Imagine a vast world filled with breathtaking landscapes, floating islands, ancient ruins, and towering mountains where danger lurks around every corner.

Prepare for an epic adventure where only the strongest will reign in the Dragons Valley. Engage in high-flying, heated battles against other players and challenge your skills in this dragon shooter experience.

A World torn By Conflict


The game's story unfolds in an era of dragons, in a fantasy world filled with mythical creatures and floating islands, where humans and dragons once coexisted harmoniously within the Valley of Dragons. However, this harmony was shattered as humanity progressed, leading to the devastation of what was once a serene region. This sparked a battle, a war between dragons split into two factions: those siding with humans and those opposing them, beginning a struggle for supremacy and dominance over the Valley of Dragons.
Once serene and beautiful, the Valley of Dragons is now a battlefield - a realm where magic and chaos collide.

Intense Dragon Battles


Lead your dragon in matches against up to 6 players, where the goal is simple: defeat your opponents and ascend to the top of the leaderboard.
Anticipate enemy movements, maneuver through the skies, and unleash devastating attacks using fireballs, flames, and speed boosts.
Control your dragon efficiently, anticipate enemy movements, and strategically utilize speed boosts, fireballs, and flames to gain advantages. Choose your favorite dragon skin along with its perks that best suit your style of play.
At the start of every match, Dragon Diamonds spawn randomly on the map.
When a player captures the diamonds, his XP increases significantly for as long as he holds them.
Other players can hunt down the dragon with the diamonds to steal them and gain the XP boost for themselves.
Will you capture the diamonds and risk becoming a target, or avoid them to focus on other objectives?

Dragon Classes


The game features three distinct classes of dragons: common, epic and legendary. Each class comprises 10 dragon skins, each possessing its own unique set of abilities, offering players various options.
As you journey through the game, unlock the full potential of your dragons by upgrading them through 10 levels. Enhance their power and abilities to gain an advantage in battles against your rivals.
Experiment with different skins to discover the perfect match for your combat style; a dragon awaits to be mastered.
